mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users( email, name, status, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{name}, 'ACTIVE'::user_status, NOW(), NOW() )

INSERT INTO user_auth_providers ( user_id, provider, provider_user_id, password_hash, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{provider}::auth_provider_type, #{providerUserId}, #{passwordHash}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.email, a.password_hash AS passwordHash FROM users u JOIN user_auth_providers a ON u.id = a.user_id WHERE u.email = #{email} LIMIT 1;
